Paralysis Enchantment

Description

The Paralysis enchantment has a chance to paralyze enemies when they are hit by the weapon. Paralyzed enemies cannot act for a duration.

Mechanics

- The chance to paralyze an enemy is based on the weapon's level - When triggered, applies the Paralysis status effect for several turns - Paralyzed enemies cannot move or attack - Particularly effective against dangerous enemies to temporarily disable them

Source Code

- Java: Paralysis.java - The effect is applied in the proc() method with probability and duration increasing with weapon level
